VIII.iv.4.B.7.b
.
SMC Under PL 85-782
PL 85-782
, effective October 10, 1958, established a level of SMC under
38 U.S.C. 1114(r)
.
Note
:  One way to establish basic entitlement to SMC under
38 U.S.C. 1114(r)
was for the Veteran to be entitled to the maximum rate under
38 U.S.C. 1114(p)
.
Reference
:  For a history of decisions regarding determination of the maximum rate under
38 U.S.C. 1114(p)
, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 4.B.12
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section B - History of Special Monthly Compensation (SMC)
